mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WORD ORDER BY FREQ DESC FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM TOPIC_WORDS ORDER BY FREQ DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
SELECT WORD_NO, WORD, FREQ, PREV_FREQ, ROUND(((FREQ - PREV_FREQ)/ DECODE(PREV_FREQ,0,1,PREV_FREQ))*100,2) AS CHANGE_RATE FROM TOPIC_WORDS ORDER BY FREQ DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

INSERT INTO TOPIC_WORDS (WORD, FREQ, PREV_FREQ, REG_DT) SELECT CASE WHEN LEVEL <= 33 THEN '사과' || LEVEL WHEN LEVEL <= 66 THEN '바나나' || (LEVEL-33) ELSE '포도' || (LEVEL-66) END AS WORD, TRUNC(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(1, 1000)) AS FREQ, TRUNC(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(1, 1000)) AS PREV_FREQ, SYSDATE AS REG_DT FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 100
select count(*) as cnt from TOPIC_WORDS
